import Chance from'chance';const chance=new Chance();export const randomUUID=()=>chance.guid();export const randomName=()=>chance.name();export const randomEmail=()=>chance.email();export const randomId=()=>chance.fbid();// facebook id
export const randomJobTitle=()=>chance.profession();export const randomCompanyName=()=>chance.company();export const randomSentence=function(){let words=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:5;return chance.sentence({words});};export const randomTitleText=function(){let words=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:3;return chance.sentence({words});};export const randomParagraphs=function(){let sentences=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:3;return chance.paragraph({sentences});};
